title: Loot Items Missing After Craft
body:
I got an honor capsule yesterday and opened it getting 5 key frags and a champ shard amumu (
i then crafted the key frags into 2 keys because i had 7 key frags altogether,then crafted my champ shard together getting 2 keys and corki ({{champion:42}}  champ
soon after crafting i went into shop just to browse and when i check my loot both keys and champ was gone
i restarted my pc as well as relogged into league but items have still gone missing?
 Please Help Riot!!!!!!

replies.body: Im sorry if imsound dumb but im quite new to league and have started playing for about a month so i'm not well with loot,and the game itself,i only just gotten lv 30

oh,i now see that it shows 2 keys at the bottom of loot but the actual keys are not there
i now also see that corki is in my inv

I went ahead and double checked your account and Corki was automatically redeemed to your Collection. You should be able to see him there. It does look like you still have 2 keys left and 1 key fragment, was there anything else you thought you were still missing?
